column2: "Okay, now that I have your report, you've cleared all the conditions and passed the test."
"I hereby grant you permission to select a subclass, <%me>."
"Now then, let me give you some advice. Subclasses give you more options in combat, it's true."
"However, you shouldn't get cocky. All it means is there's more that you can do. It doesn't mean that you've become stronger."
"Don't forget that. After all, there's only one of you, and we'd hate to lose you."

"When you set a subclass, some of its abilities will become available along with those from your main class. To set a subclass, choose \"Switch Classes,\" then \"Select Subclass\" at the Class Counter."
"Hunters who select Force as a subclass can unleash Foie from the subpalette and gain the benefits of the Boost PP skill."
"However, the main class's equippable weapons, alt actions, and evasive actions will remain unchanged. For example, Hunters who select Force as a subclass can't equip rods or use Mirage Escape."
